DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD MHN_NUMBER varchar2(10)
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD DECISION varchar2(10)
CREATE INDEX PALLET_MHN_IDX ON APP_PALLET (MHN_NUMBER)
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET_HISTORY ADD MHN_NUMBER varchar2(10)
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET_HISTORY ADD DECISION varchar2(10)

CREATE TABLE "APP_MHN" ( "MHN_NUMBER" VARCHAR2(10), "INITIATOR" VARCHAR2(20), "RECORDER" VARCHAR2(20), "AUTHORISOR" VARCHAR2(20), "REASON1" VARCHAR2(10), "REASON2" VARCHAR2(10), "REASON3" VARCHAR2(10), "DATE_CREATED" DATE, "DATE_EXPECTED" DATE, "DATE_RESOLVED" DATE, "STATUS" VARCHAR2(20), "REQUIRED_RESOURCE" VARCHAR2(50), "COMMENT" VARCHAR2(250) )
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "PK_APP_MHN" ON "APP_MHN" ("MHN_NUMBER")
CREATE TABLE "APP_MHN_DECISIONS" ( "DECISION" VARCHAR2(10), "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(50), "COLOR_FOREGROUND" NUMBER(*,0), "COLOR_BACKGROUND" NUMBER(*,0) )
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "PK_APP_MHN_DECISION" ON "APP_MHN_DECISIONS" ("DECISION")
CREATE TABLE "APP_MHN_REASONS" ( "REASON" VARCHAR2(10), "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(50) )
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "PK_APP_REASONS" ON "APP_MHN_REASONS" ("REASON")
